definitions.definition: ( also attributively ) A shutdown of a nuclear reactor (or, by extension , some other thing ), often done rapidly due to an emergency .
The device used to shut down a nuclear reactor ; also, the button or switch used to initiate a shutdown.

main_definition: ( also attributively ) A shutdown of a nuclear reactor (or, by extension , some other thing ), often done rapidly due to an emergency .
secondary_definitions: The device used to shut down a nuclear reactor ; also, the button or switch used to initiate a shutdown.

definitions.definition: A scratch , especially caused by claws or fingernails .
A mine previously worked on where most of the ore is believed to have been removed , but which is still being mined on a small scale .

main_definition: ( Derbyshire , Wales ) A scratch , especially caused by claws or fingernails .
secondary_definitions: ( US , mining , archaic ) A mine previously worked on where most of the ore is believed to have been removed , but which is still being mined on a small scale .
